name: Avinash Sales
overview:
Established in the year 2005, we, “Avinash Sales Corporation”, are one of the reputed and most trusted organizations engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a wide assortment of Door Accessories and Cable Managers.

Our Products : Window Cabinet Handle Aluminium Cabinet Handle Zinc Alloy Cabinet Handle Decorative Cabinet Handle Fancy Cabinet Handle Door Handle Cabinet Handle Cabinet Knob Hinge Fitting Cable Manager

Our Team: Supported by a team of qualified and diligent professionals, we have so far been able to successfully cater to the emerging requirements of our valued clients in an efficient manner. They are well-abreast with the latest technologies and methodologies, and help our firm to fabricate a commendable array of Door Accessories and Cable Managers.

Our Quality: We are an established organization of this industry, which is committed towards offering an outstanding assortment of Door Accessories and Cable Managers to our valued clients.

Our Infrastructure: The technically sound infrastructure of our firm enables us to ensure streamlined business operations. It also aids us in meeting bulk orders of patrons within the stipulated time frame. Manufacturing unit being a core part of our firm enables us to maintain swift & smooth rate of production, and meet the diversified needs and demands of the patrons.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client-centric organization paying utmost importance towards attaining maximum level of customer satisfaction. For that matter, we provide clients with optimum quality range of door accessories, which is designed and developed by making use of qualitative raw material in accordance with industry laid standards.
